subject: Tennis
Italian Open (Tennis)
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray, long a top player on hard and grass courts, has won 10 straight matches on clay this season, including two titles, and said he had a chance at winning the French Open.
snippet: Andy Murray, long a top player on hard and grass courts, has won 10 straight matches on clay this season, including two titles, and said he had a chance at winning the French Open.
